    </script><script data-rh="true" type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"http://schema.org/","@type":"NewsArticle","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://google.com/article"},"description":"Nadi International Airport in Fiji has the 10th most scenic airport landing in the world.                         if (window.WM && window.WM.UserConsent && window.WM.UserConsent.isEnabled() &&
                            window.WM.UserConsent.inUserConsentState(["vendor"," data-store"," content-person-prof"," content-person"," measure-ads"," measure-content"," product-develop"]) === false)
                        {
                                window.optimizely = window.optimizely || [];
                                window.optimizely.push({ 'type': 'disable' });
                        }
                    </script><script data-rh="true" src="https://cdn.optimizely.com/js/128727546.js"></script><script data-rh="true">
                            var _sf_async_config = _sf_async_config || {};

                            _sf_async_config.domain = window.location.host;

.fuZPrg{-webkit-text-decoration:none;text-decoration:none;-webkit-transition:color 0.4s ease;transition:color 0.4s ease;text-align:center;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;font-size:18px;color:#4D4D4D;font-size:14px;font-weight:400;-webkit-letter-spacing:0;-moz-letter-spacing:0;-ms-letter-spacing:0;letter-spacing:0;line-height:10px;} .fuZPrg:hover{color:#262626;} .fuZPrg:hover{-webkit-text-decoration:underline;text-decoration:underline;cursor:pointer;}
/* sc-component-id: sc-kAzzGY */

/* sc-component-id: sc-global-1945296911 */
body{overflow:visible;}</style></head><body><div id="mount"><div class="Chrome__component"><span style="font-size:0"></span><div class=""><div class="StickyTop__ad" style="transition:max-height 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);max-height:none"><div class="Ad__component"><div class="Ad__tag" id="ad_bnr_atf_01"></div></div></div><span style="font-size:0"></span><div class="Header__container Header__isShown"><div class="Header__component header" style="transition:transform 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);transform:translateY(0)"><div class="Header__wrapper"><div class="Header__logo"><a class="Header__logoCNN" href="/" target="_self"></a><a class="Header__logoTravel" href="/travel" target="_self"></a></div><div class="Header__navigation"><a class="Header__section" href="/travel/destinations" target="_self">Destinations</a><a class="Header__section" href="/travel/food-and-drink" target="_self">Food &amp; Drink</a><a class="Header__section" href="/travel/news" target="_self">News</a><a class="Header__section" href="/travel/stay" target="_self">Stay</a><a class="Header__section Header__video" href="/travel/videos" target="_self">Video</a><div class="Header__search"><span class="Header__hidden">Search</span></div><div class="Header__burger"><div class="Header__burgerIcon"><span class="Header__hidden">Menu</span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div style="transition:padding-top 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1);padding-top:50px"></div><div class="Chrome__content"><div></div><div></div><div class="sc-fONwsr kqJjsk"><div class="Article__component Article__hasEntitlement"><div class="Zone__component Article__zone"><div class="Article__pageTop"><div class="Article__wrapper Article__topWrapper"><div class="Article__pageHead Article__pad"><a href="/travel/specials/business-traveller" target="_self"><div class="Article__branding">Business Traveller</div></a><h1 class="Article__title">World's 10 most scenic airport landings for 2020</h1><div class="Article__subtitle">Maureen O'Hare, CNN<!-- -->  <!-- -->Updated 28th September 2020</div></div><div class="Article__head Article__pad"><div class="SocialBar__component SocialBar__horizontal Article__socialBar"><span class="SocialBar__icon SocialBar__facebook">Facebook</span><span class="SocialBar__icon SocialBar__twitter">Twitter</span><span class="SocialBar__icon SocialBar__email">Email</span></div><div class="Article__entitlement"><div data-ad-branding="business_traveller" id="ad_mod_85a882a72"></div></div></div></div><div class="Hero__component"><div class="Hero__wrapper Hero__mobileGallery"><div class="Hero__gallery"><div class="Image__component Image__hasAspectRatio" style="padding-top:56.25%"><img alt="View of the Mountain Tropical Coastline Beach of Nadi Airport Runway, Fiji" class="Image__image" src="https://dynaimage.cdn.cnn.com/cnn/e_blur:500,q_auto:low,w_50,c_fill,g_auto,h_28,ar_16:9/http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.cnn.com%2Fcnnnext%2Fdam%2Fassets%2F200915174328-view-of-the-mountain-tropical-coastline-beach-of-nadi-airport-runway-fiji.jpg"/></div><div class="Hero__galleryCta"><div class="Hero__galleryCtaIcon"></div><div class="Hero__galleryCtaText"><div class="Hero__label">View Gallery</div><div class="Hero__count">10<!-- --> Pictures</div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="Article__wrapper"><div class="Article__primary"><div><div class="Article__content"><div class="Article__pad"><div class="Article__body Article__hasReadMore" style="max-height:"><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_C1B86187-149E-8E0B-4472-92BFA84CB70C"><cite class="Paragraph__cite">(CNN)  </cite><span>They say absence makes the heart grow fonder.</span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_8167E744-D72D-AA57-49BA-92C84724C67A"><span>The world's most scenic airport airport approaches, as ranked annually by booking platform <a href="https://www.privatefly.com/airport-poll/privatefly-airport-poll-results-2020.html" target="_blank">PrivateFly</a>, are this year looking more glorious than ever. </span></div><div><div class="Ad__component"><div class="Ad__tag Article__adBody Ad__hasLabel" id="ad_rect_atf_02"></div></div></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_9D3D540E-360A-4F03-DAE6-92CA69DFBFEB"><span>More than 6,000 frequent fliers and aviation enthusiasts took part in the 2020 poll, with voting taking place in February and March, just before travel restrictions to fight Covid-19 were introduced around the world. </span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_BBBBC4B0-ED50-CE9B-9D64-92CCFA8EE7C9"><span>The winner, for the third year in a row, is Ireland's Donegal Airport. On the island's northwest coast, there are sweeping views of rugged coastline, pristine beaches and the steep slopes of Mount Errigal on the approach to this regional airport in Carrickfinn. </span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_767DA1F5-5A13-2D84-6D1D-92BFE39B5CF5"><span>While the top spot was held by an old favorite, there are six new entries in this new year's top 10. </span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_3BBA7A83-5122-BB93-F224-9669557A829C"><span>The highest new entry is Tanzania's Msembe Airstrip, in second place, which serves East Africa's Ruaha National Park. </span></div><div class="Ad__component"><div class="Ad__tag" id="ad_nat_btf_01"></div></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_6E77BC1E-0AB8-D12F-6C28-966A6F5F5D63"><span>Skiathos Alexandros Papadiamantis Airport, at number three, is also making its debut. The airport on the Greek island of Skiathos, in the Aegean Sea, is popular with planespotters thanks to its short runway and close proximity to a public road. </span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_3BD337B9-09ED-D06E-4893-9670372D4854"><span>"Many of us have flown less frequently this year, but these ultimate destination landings are a welcome reminder of the uplifting power of travel and aviation -- and a jaw-dropping inspiration for some memorable future flights," Adam Twidell, CEO of the UK-based booking platform for private jet charters, said in a press release. </span></div><div class="CaptionedImage__component"><div class="Image__component CaptionedImage__image Image__hasAspectRatio" style="padding-top:56.25%"><img alt="Scenic aiprort views - Donegal Airport" class="Image__image" src="https://dynaimage.cdn.cnn.com/cnn/e_blur:500,q_auto:low,w_50,c_fill,g_auto,h_28,ar_16:9/http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.cnn.com%2Fcnnnext%2Fdam%2Fassets%2F190321175511-scenia-airport-views---donegal-airport-view-5464x3070-credit-owen-clarke-2.jpg"/></div><div class="CaptionedImage__caption">Donegal Airport on Ireland's northwest Atlantic coast claimed the top spot for the third year running.</div><div class="CaptionedImage__credit">Courtesy Owen Clarke</div></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_0563A661-BDB3-39C2-053F-9672EF3DC3E4"><span>Florida's Orlando Melbourne International Airport was the only top 10 entry for the United States, holding onto its ranking as the fourth most scenic airport view in the world. </span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_8BA51E04-EDEF-8A10-DAAB-9672F39945D6"><span>"First, you see the beautiful Atlantic Ocean and then pass over the Indian and Banana Rivers," one 2019 voter said of this descent.</span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_95113F89-91B6-B50F-1ED2-9672F3996611"><span>"Then, there is a pass over the Kennedy Space Center and Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, where you may get a glimpse of a rocket on a launch pad." </span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_DA4606DA-911A-83D8-CBE2-96742F7055E5"><span>Scotland's Barra Airport approach, which offers stunning coastal views, slipped down three spots to fifth place, while Bora Bora's Motu Mute Airport is ranked sixth best in the world. It's built on a island on a crystal-blue lagoon in French Polynesia. </span></div><div class="RelatedArticle__component"><div class="RelatedArticle__label">Related content</div><a class="RelatedArticle__link" href="/travel/article/countries-that-fell-off-the-map/index.html" target="_blank">New book 'Atlas of Extinct Countries' explores the places that fell off the map</a></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_4703FC04-3F8A-D82F-2F31-960E953C2E95"><span>St Maarten's Princess Juliana International Airport, where planes swoop low over Maho Beach, is at number eight, and the Seychelles' Praslin Island Airport at number nine. </span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_1E26B6B5-B8EB-B639-AB96-9680CBDF3D32"><span>The top 10 was rounded out by two new entries: Dubai International Airport and Fiji's Nadi International Airport. </span></div><div class="Article__inlineVideo"><div class="VideoPlayer__wrapper"></div><div class="VideoPlayer__description">Trans Maldivian Airways is the world's largest float plane operator. We go on the job with one of its most experienced pilots, Canadian Andrew Farr. </div></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F220629E-EE96-595A-DF1E-96BB36EE3821"><span>For the first time, the poll also revealed the highest-ranked airport by region. The Asian winner, Mal (Velana) International Airport the Maldives, was the only one not to also break the top 10. </span></div><div class="Ad__component"><div class="Ad__tag Article__adBody Ad__hasLabel" id="ad_rect_btf_01"></div></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_DEA39FC2-81CF-FC55-8030-968A247B6193"><span>The airport is a base for Trans Maldivian Airways, the world's largest seaplane operator, which is famed for its unconventionally clad <a href="https://cnn.com/travel/article/trans-maldivian-airways-maldives/index.html" target="_blank">"barefoot pilots."</a></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_5C7E811F-E66A-B1FB-FF5C-A1233FC9FA80"><span><h3>10 most scenic airport landings, according to PrivateFly </h3></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_58167752-289F-2889-6C7F-967236185611"><span><strong>1. Donegal Airport, Ireland </strong></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_9C88AF0F-0EEC-58E9-CC88-9672362077CC"><span><strong>2. Msembe Airstrip, Tanzania </strong></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F3583405-6365-1754-2488-967236284F33"><span><strong>3. Skiathos (Alexandros Papadiamantis) Airport, Greece </strong></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_84F625FD-0F34-3010-D92E-9672363113BC"><span><strong>4. Orlando (Melbourne) International Airport, Florida</strong></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_DE8F274B-A9E7-5040-E125-9672363C96A9"><span><strong>5. Barra Airport, Scotland </strong></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_AAA6E1AA-D3FA-3451-0EEF-96723646BF71"><span><strong>6. Bora Bora (Motu Mute) Airport, French Polynesia </strong></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_CCBE46AC-08D4-BB5E-B1C6-9672364F61BD"><span><strong>7. St Maarten (Princess Juliana) International Airport, St Maarten </strong></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_8B569701-A592-34EA-ACAA-967236599561"><span><strong>8. Praslin Island Airport, Seychelles </strong></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_8B69A1EF-2487-3A22-EC4C-9672366139F7"><span><strong>9. Dubai International Airport, United Arab Emirates </strong></span></div><div class="Paragraph__component" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_1FD76075-A211-BB91-464C-968EB7E7D6D8"><span><strong>10. Nadi International Airport, Fiji </strong></span></div></div></div><div class="Article__contentTail"><div class="Zone__component Article__zone Article__contentTailZone"><div class="lazyload-placeholder" style="height:100%"></div></div><div class="Zone__component Article__zone Article__promo"><div class="PromoBestBeaches__component"><a class="" href="//www.cnn.com/interactive/travel/best-beaches" target="_self"><div class="PromoBestBeaches__content"><span class="PromoBestBeaches__titleTop">A year of the world's</span><span class="PromoBestBeaches__beaches">Best Beaches</span><span class="PromoBestBeaches__titleBottom">There's a perfect beach for every week of the year. Join us on a 12-month journey to see them all</span><div class="Button__component Button__light Button__WHITE PromoBestBeaches__button"><span class="Button__ctaText">Go to the best beaches</span></div></div><div class="PromoBestBeaches__wrapper"><div class="Image__component PromoBestBeaches__heroImage Image__hasAspectRatio" style="padding-top:56.25%"><img alt=""
